detectors.description:
USDCPool.rewardRate(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#359-373) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-steps = (timestamp - starttime) / 3600 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#360)
	-duration_mod = timestamp - starttime - 3600 * steps (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#361)
detectors.markdown:
[USDCPool.rewardRate(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#L359-L373) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[steps = (timestamp - starttime) / 3600](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#L360)
	-[duration_mod = timestamp - starttime - 3600 * steps](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#L361)

detectors.description:

	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#421)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#210)
		- _token.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#293)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#422)
		- lv.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#390)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#210)

	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#422)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#335)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#422)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#334)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#422)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#389)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#337)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#422)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#338)

	- duration_mod > 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/USDCPool.sol#368)
